data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 924 believers in Kolasib.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kolasib, Mizoram, India

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 924 believers in Kolasib against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, to the people of Kolasib you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kolasib, Mizoram, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, remember the Chakma people. Make the Chakma people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Kolasib, Mizoram, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Kolasib against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kolasib, Mizoram, India has a population of 84,000.

We estimate Kolasib has 924 people who might know Jesus, 1,019 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 82,057 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kolasib.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
